articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Confirmed: The Oldest Human Footprints in North America Are at Least 21500 Years Old - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Footprints scattered across what is now the desert of New Mexico were trod by human feet no earlier than 21,500 years ago, new research has confirmed.
articles.content:
Footprints scattered across what is now the desert of New Mexico were trod by human feet no earlier than 21,500 years ago, new research has confirmed.
